1.0.0.name: wordpress/who-visit-me
1.0.0.description:
*Who - visit - me display gravatar, visit time, blog link, the source address (IP real address ) for all friends who have ever left a comment when they visit the next time.
*Display recent visitor in your blog sidebar.
*If you have questions, Please contact [admin#winysky.com] or leave a message in my blog(http://winysky.com).

*who-visit-me(最近来访）不是一个访问统计插件，本插件功能显示最近访问博客的朋友，类似于SNS网站“最近来访”功能。凡是曾在博客留言的朋友下次来访均可以显示头像、到访时间、博客链接、来源地址(ip真实地址-邪恶的功能）
*可在后台设置参数
*提供技术支持及咨询，联系邮件请发【admin#winysky.com】或者在我博客【http://winysky.com】留言

plugin update 1.0.0
